General.Name: Empresa Metropolitana de Águas e Energia S.A
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Empresa Metropolitana de Águas e Energia S.A. engages in planning, construction, operation, and maintenance of production systems and sale of electricity in Brazil. The company operates hydraulic system consisting of dikes, dams and reservoirs, and spillways such as Billings and Guarapiranga, in the extreme south of the city of São Paulo, as well as the São Paulo and Pedreira pumping plants and the Pinheiros River channel, in the city of São Paulo. It also engages in assets construction; and offers operation and maintenance services for plant facilities and related structures for companies and public bodies. The company was founded in 1899 and is headquartered in Sao Paulo, Brazil.
General.Address: Av. Jornalista Roberto Marinho, 85, São Paulo, SP, Brazil, 04576-010
